item.description:
4/7/11  I made the hotel reservations for 2 of us today.

By this weekend I will be ordering 6 tickets.

Great looking Guest List.

http://www.chillertheatre.com/gt/gtc4.htm

www.chillertheatre.com/gt/gtc4.htm

--   ----     ----    ----   ----    ----    ----   ---

There will be updates & reminders when we have

more information regarding the Expo & planned trip.

Spring 2011 Chiller Theater Expo

www.chillertheatre.com/main.htm

http://www.chillertheatre.com/main.htm

Look at link for event details;

I will be contacting those coming with me Later on.

We will be driving to Chiller Theatre Toy, Model and Film Extravaganza

Hilton Hotel Parsippany, New Jersey, 07054

Directions can be found on the link.

I do go a different way;

From West Haven I 95 to Exit 38 veer left towards

The Merritt Parkway that later becomes the Hutchinson River Parkway to

Exit 26 West on to I 287 West & I 87.

Take exit 15 to get off I 87 To stay on I 287.

(FYI Exit 55 has a Wendys or Burger King if you need a break.

The Burger King is closer to the High Way Ramp.)

Exit 39B to Rte 10 W towards Dover.

Exit on to Dryden Way.

Left on Campus Drive.

Left on Hilton Ct.

Pay attention to turns.

I had missed a turn and had to go back.

You can Park in the Building Complex on the Left.

Short Walk to the Hilton Hotel beyond the Pond on the Left.

To answer the question of what is Chiller Con?

Chiiller Con has a few things happening;

various vendors are selling their products such as DVDs or Model Figurines

or Magazines or Autographed Photos, etc.

Newer Genre or B Movie Stars are there to promote their most recent genre movies.

Elder stars come out of their retirement to meet their fans.

Wrestlers, Writers, Artists & other kinds of entertainers also come out to meet their fans.

It is usually lots of fun.

There is a listing of guests.

http://www.chillertheatre.com/gt/gtc4.htm

www.chillertheatre.com/gt/gtc4.htm

Remember to bring your cameras.

A listing of stars / guests will also come in handy.

There might be long lines to get some autographs.

The Expo is all weekend from Friday, April 29 to Sunday, May 1, 

I am going on Saturday, April 30.

If more than one vehicle is going, then the passengers should

Share phone numbers in case the different vehicles have to contact each other.

For Ordering Tickets send all payments to:

Chiller Theatre, Inc. P O Box 23 Rutherford NJ 07070

http://www.chillertheatre.com/c4tickets.htm

www.chillertheatre.com/c4tickets.htm

I will be spending Saturday night at

America's Best Value Inn Whippany

(Near the highway & Hilton Inn.)

 at (973) 539-8383

Mike B

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: We will either be with each other or have each other's cell phone number.
item.why: This is a weekend trip where we get to see various celebrity guests and can buy from vendors items that are usually not found elsewhere.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ Meets the Stars at Chiller Theater Expo
